Subject: Disk Expansion (A-Plas Genel Otomotiv)
Description:
Hello Team,

Our customer wants to increase the disk size. They mentioned that they have added a disk. Can we schedule a remote session tomorrow for the increase?

Best Regards.
What_We_Know__c:

Went on the backend to increase the disk the disk accordingly.
Tested out afterwards and it was working as expected.
Client could see the increase size.
Also assisted with increasing the CPU for better performance.
Agreed to close the case as everything was working successfully.
